Bruker pulse program two character code definitions http://liubin.name/post/bruker_pulse_program_two_character_code_definitions/ Mon, 17 Jun 2019 22:39:05 +0800 http://liubin.name/post/bruker_pulse_program_two_character_code_definitions/

以下内容拷贝至这个文档

For Bruker pulse programs the first characters (usually 4, but at a maximum 6) specify the type of experiment, e.g. DEPT, COSY, NOESY etc.. Further properties of the pulse program are indicated by a two-character code, which is added to the name in alphabetical order. For 2-D experiments the default version is “absolute value” and “without dummy scans”. H- or X-decoupling is assumed to be default for heteronuclear experiments, but not for homonuclear ones (with the exception of inad). In case of redundant information some two-character codes may be omitted.

超低温探头ATM部件维修/Cryoprobe ATM Unit Main Repairing on Bruker Avance III HD 850MHz http://liubin.name/post/850-atm-unit-main-repairing/ Fri, 10 May 2019 10:52:20 +0800 http://liubin.name/post/850-atm-unit-main-repairing/

今年3月份的时候，850MHz的超低温探头CPTCI的ATM出现调谐跳不过去的问题，底下是我的维修记录。曾经咨询过厂商，厂商的意思是如果给我更换一个好的ATM部件，可以用，就说明是ATM的问题，此部件报价13万人民币。太贵，承受不起，我就自己修了。
